Hi there guys. I've been away. I had simultaneously huge problems with 
both of my families: in Japan (a divorce - not mine!!!) and in Europe 
(my mom was sick, and my sister was on a train in Madrid the day of the 
bombs - no BS!! She's ok, luckily). I used my spring-break to fix all 
the mess, but sadly I wasn't able to go to Kyoto and to participate to 
the discussions on this mailing list. Now I have 395 messages to 
read... hihihi.
I missed you guys.
ciao
Cepo, from Honolulu
PS=I'll be in japan in the summer, so the gathering is still up, uh?
